articles.author: Rick Porter, Lexy Perez
articles.title: ‘Summer I Turned Pretty’ Finale Movie Greenlit at Prime Video - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The announcement comes just after the show’s third and (apparently not quite) final season concluded.
articles.content:
It appears the final season of The Summer I Turned Pretty won’t be the last word on the series after all.

articles.author: Owen Gleiberman
articles.title: 'One Battle After Another' Review: P.T. Anderson's Mesmerizing Vision - Variety
articles.description: Leonardo DiCaprio and Sean Penn are brilliant in Paul Thomas Anderson's film about autocracy, revolution...and a father and daughter torn apart.
articles.content: “One Battle After Another,” the turbulently powerful and enveloping new movie written and directed by Paul Thomas Anderson, is set in an America that’s become a fascist police state: a place where im… [+11122 chars]
